answers.answer: I might be headed to preeclampysia they said so I would like to see ppl respond to this! Bump for you!
Thanks ladys yeah I'm so confused on what it is and what will happen I'm excited to meet my little guy but not under these circumstances

Well I don't know a whole lot. My sister had preeclampsia with her first baby. She delivered him and he was still born and she went into distress. They suggest bed rest to keep your blood pressuredown. Please follow your doctors orders and keep you and little one safe.

I'm taking high blood pressure meds and have to go to the hospital 2 a week to get ntsb non stress tests plus go to the doctors weekly. I'm only 33 weeks and have to get a shot to develop the babies lungs tomorrow and Friday
My blood pressure was perfect before I was pregnant and thankfully my baby is fine right now its me that they are worried about
Yeah they said baby is fine but I guess the concern is with me I'm already 38+4 so there prob just going to induce me I find out today waiting st the ob as we speak

You'll be induced with my son I was 36 weeks 1day me and hubby went to a regular docs appt and the last 2 appts bp was high the sent me straight to triage which thankfully was just next door and monitored me for a few hours still wouldn't go down so doc came in and said were having this baby tonight.... We were like wait my mom hasn't arrive in town which was only 5hrs away thank god but he was born 6lbs 1oz and was in the nicu for 2weeks and he's a happy healthy 2yr old now!
Ok yeah that's really all they can do and atleast in at term and he's already big thanks

I had preeclampsia in my first pregnancy near the end. I was already on bedrest due to high risk but they planned to induce me a week later i would have been 38 weeks but i went into labour that same day. Theyll do nst tests and monitor your blood pressure if it gets really bad they sometimes do an emergency.c section(usually only if it turns into toxemia) but mostly just plan to induce.

question: So my doctor today said my blood pressure was high and he wanted to test for pre clampsia anyone have experience with this and what it entales he said to come back in the morning tomorrow and that they will decide from there if they will induce me or not he's also a big baby 8lbs 1oz right now and I'm still closed
title: whats happening ??
